title.rendered: Aqualis ASA: Mandatory notification of trade

content.rendered: Kristin Brown Ranvik, a related party to Christian Opsahl, CFO of Aqualis ASA (Aqualis), has on 29 October 2015 acquired 9,000 shares at an average price of NOK 5,694 per share. Following this transaction Christian Opsahl and related parties own a total of 1,157,050 shares in Aqualis.
